finish ch10-12. Came here to complains more about the shitty ending, but surprise indeed. Anyway fuck the ending

The ending is so whack it's hilarious. The boyfriend is revealed to be a legit cuck who let the main guy fuck his girlfriend and was planning on letting other people fuck her only for the main guy to confront him because he loves her. The girl finds out but decides to meet with her boyfriend again to officially break up but he drugs her so other men can rape her only for the main guy to knock him out. The girl wakes up and BOOM...it's revealed in a flashback that the girl's dad forced main guy's mom into cheating on his dad using money and then his dad left them and his mom worked herself to death after the girl's dad forced her to repay the money he gave her. The main guy then lets other men rape her as revenge and the story ends. Somehow the girl didn't know the main guy was an orphan even though it says on the first page that they've all been friends since elementary school lol...that's some Shyamalan meets Stephen King on crack nonsense right there.
@Lukeboi She never rejected him...she had feelings for him but could never act on them...instead she went out with the friend for some weird reason.
Just a heads up, the ending for this sucks. Feels very rushed & unsatisfying.
